text: Yutaka Ashikaga (born October 15, 1968 in Kawaba-gun, Akita, Japan) is a former Japanese baseball player.https://www.baseball- reference.com/register/player.cgi?id=ashika000yut He pitched for the Fukuoka Daiei Hawks in the Pacific League. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1968 births Category:Baseball people from Akita Prefecture Category:Japanese baseball players Category:Fukuoka Daiei Hawks players Category:Yokohama BayStars players
title: Yutaka Ashikaga
